articles.content: New Delhi: Tata Power, a leading integrated power company in India, has joined the prestigious club of firms with a market cap exceeding Rs 1 lakh crore, marking it as the second infrastructure entit… [+1347 chars]

articles.title: SIPs hit a new high in November, exceeding ₹17,000 crore | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Small and mid-cap schemes continue to attract investor interest, amidst overall drop in equity fund inflows.
articles.content: The number of systematic investment plans (SIPs) exceeded 17,000 crore for the first time. The SIP book for the month reached 17,073 crore, surpassing the October figure of 16,928 crore, shows AMFI d… [+1676 chars]
